entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer â€” A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

entry.title: KrishnaHarni/FruitInfo: FruitInfo is a clean, responsive web application built with React and Tailwind CSS that showcases detailed information about various fruits. The project uses a locally stored dataset (an array of objects) to simulate API-like data handling, making it lightweight and fast.
entry.content: FruitInfo is a clean, responsive web application built with React and Tailwind CSS that showcases detailed information about various fruits. The project uses a locally stored dataset (an array of objects) to simulate API-like data handling, making it lightweight and fast.

entry.title: Siva-techie-003/CozyKitchen: CozyKitchen is a modern recipe website featuring global recipes across Vegan, Vegetarian, Non-Veg, and Dessert categories. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it runs fully on the frontend, making it fast, lightweight, and easy to host anywhere.

entry.title: Achintha-999/task-manager-api: Task Manager API is a lightweight RESTful API built with Node.js, Express, and Sequelize ORM. It provides basic CRUD operations for managing tasks and uses SQLite as the database.
